pr_title: Various Hibernate ORM extension refactorings to pave the way for Hibernate Reactive

timeline.message: Hibernate ORM processor is actually not using the org.hibernate.service.spi.ServiceContributor SPI
Extract building of QuarkusScanner into a static helper
Move multi tenancy strategy checks out of HibernateOrmProcessor#build
Document the need to depend on the HibernateOrmIntegrationBuildItem build item
Improve handling of the SKIP_PARSE_PERSISTENCE_XML system property
Dead code removal: no longer needing RecordedState#getJtaPlatform()
Extract a ProxyBuildingHelper to simplify the code for proxy generation
Remove the recently introduced isJtaPresent flag

timeline.bodyText: Somehow, it looks like I missed something when I worked on that. We can probably remove it for now but at some point we might have to finish that properly.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: yes, I also plan to rework how services are discovered, but need the Envers extension first.
replies.author: Sanne
